Yousef Ourabi wrote:
> Hello:
> I sent a somewhat similar email to this list yesterday that seems to 
> have been blocked due to the attached patches? Ignore that one if it 
> ends up making it to the list as I've slightly changed the way I tweaked 
> things. 


Apparently, Yahoo Groups recently added another layer of spam catching: 
I just logged onto the group management interface and found a handful of 
messages awaiting approval from over the past 8 days. (All were valid -- 
and in the same period, 'home typists needed' snuck through.)

I've approved the non-duplicate messages and will keep a closer eye on 
this new holding pen.

- Gordon @ IA
